creator: david.boxall@halliburton.com
text:
Hi we are running Webtop (Documentum) and we are using Tomcat/Apache version
4.1, we are having issue where our servers lock up it seems to be a thread
that’s locking up this in turn is causing other threads to stay open which in
turn causes the server to fall over… Is this a known bug is there a fix for this????

creator: trusso@ceicomgroup.com
text:
Hi, 
i have the same problem.

(In reply to comment #0)
> Hi we are running Webtop (Documentum) and we are using Tomcat/Apache version
> 4.1, we are having issue where our servers lock up it seems to be a thread
> that’s locking up this in turn is causing other threads to stay open which in
> turn causes the server to fall over… Is this a known bug is there a fix for 
this????

Bugzilla is not a support forum. Questions like this should be asked on the
users list. See http://tomcat.apache.org/lists.html
creator: markt@apache.org
